      • V1Config

        public V1Config()

      • V1Config

        public V1Config(String url,
        String userName,

        Parameters:

        userName - VersionOne user name
        password - VersionOne password

      • V1Config

        public V1Config(String url,
        String userName,
        String password,
        String pattern,
        String referenceField,
        Boolean fullyQualifiedBuildName)
        Parameters:
        url - VersionOne server URL
        userName - VersionOne user name
        password - VersionOne password
        pattern - Regular expression to find VersionOne workitem IDs
        referenceField - Name of field used in VCS commit comments to reference VersionOne items
        fullyQualifiedBuildName - use full name of build

      • V1Config

        public V1Config(String url,
        String userName,
        String password,
        String pattern,
        String referenceField,
        Boolean fullyQualifiedBuildName,
        boolean useProxy,
        String proxyUrl,
        String proxyUsername,
        String proxyPassword)
        Parameters:
        url - VersionOne server URL
        userName - VersionOne user name
        password - VersionOne password
        pattern - Regular expression to find VersionOne workitem IDs
        referenceField - Name of field used in VCS commit comments to reference VersionOne items
        fullyQualifiedBuildName - use full name of build
        useProxy - Flag indicating whether we should use proxy server to connect to VersionOne
        proxyUrl - Proxy server URL
        proxyUsername - Proxy server username
        proxyPassword - Proxy server password

      • setLogger

        public void setLogger(PrintStream logger)
        Set logger so we could use it to populate messages to Hudson
        Parameters:

      • isConnectionValid

        public boolean isConnectionValid()
        Validate connection to the VersionOne server
        Returns:
        true if all settings is correct and connection to V1 is valid, false - otherwise
